name: chrono roll
description:
in chrono roll, you have to jump, roll, and die (a lot) to get to the top of the cuckoo clock

can you beat the big bad bird at the top?

keyboard controls:

left arrow:right arrow:z key:         move leftmove rightjump 

controller controls:

d-pad left: d-pad right: any face button: move left move right jump

made in 3 day for mini jam #112

theme: chrono

limitation: only 3 buttons
